original_text: Like the parts of a body, God has put people in different places in his church. First, there are apostles. Second, there are people who speak messages from God. Third, there are teachers. After that, there are people who do miracles. There are people who have gifts to make sick people well. There are people who help others in special ways. There are people who can lead others. And there are people who can speak different kinds of languages.
korean_text: 하나님이 교회 중에 몇을 세우셨으니 첫째는 사도요 둘째는 선지자요 셋째는 교사요 그 다음은 능력을 행하는 자요 그 다음은 병 고치는 은사와 서로 돕는 것과 다스리는 것과 각종 방언을 말하는 것이라

sentences.original_text: Like the parts of a body
God has put people in different places in his church
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 사람들을 자신의 교회에 다른 자리에 두셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Second, there are people who speak messages from God
sentences.korean_translation: 둘째, 하나님의 메시지를 전하는 사람들이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: After that, there are people who do miracles
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에, 기적을 행하는 사람들이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: There are people who have gifts to make sick people well
sentences.korean_translation: 병자를 고치는 은사를 가진 사람들이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: There are people who help others in special ways
sentences.korean_translation: 특별한 방법으로 다른 사람들을 돕는 사람들이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: There are people who can lead others
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들을 이끌 수 있는 사람들이 있습니다

sentences.original_text: And there are people who can speak different kinds of languages
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여러 종류의 언어를 말할 수 있는 사람들이 있습니다
